summary: Implements an asynchronous WebSocket client for the CoinEx cryptocurrency exchange, handling connection setup, authentication, channel subscriptions, and parsing of incoming messages to keep real-time balances, order books, tickers, trades, and order states up to date.
business_intent: Provides developers and trading systems with live market and account data from CoinEx, facilitating algorithmic trading, portfolio monitoring, and automated order management through a unified CCXT Pro interface.
